entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
